string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Walks Down the Road of Regrets4
I received permission to go all the way to #m270020400#. If I want to go beyond that, I need to take a test. I should go to #b#p2140000##k to receive the test.
#p2140000# said if I want to go in further, go to #b#m270020400##k and defeat #r999 #o8200008##k. \n\n#o8200008# #r#a35111##k
I defeated 999 #o8200008# 999. #p2140000# granted me permission. Of course, this permission only allows to me to go up to #m270020500#.
If you want to go in further, you'll need to take a harder test... Makes perfect sense, no? So what do you want? Do you want the new test?
Then go to #b#m270020400##k and defeat the #r#o8200008##k. If you defeat #r999#k of them, I will grant you permission to go beyond that.
That's too hard for you? That's too bad then. I guess that's just your limit.
You've defeated 999 #o8200008#. That's amazing. I will grant you the permission as promised.
#dAs the representative of Rhinne, the Goddess of Time, I grant you permission to look back at your 5th regret#k.
Go on. You should be able to go up till #b#m270020500##k. As you may have guessed, you can't go beyond that. If you want to go further... you'll have to take a new test.
You haven't defeated #r999 #o8200008##k yet. I don't think you are strong enough to walk against the flow of the past yet.
